mapper.insert: insert into h_dbc_service(service_id, service_name, service_desc, created_at) values (#{serviceId}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceDesc}, #{createdAt})
insert into h_dbc_acc_service(app, username, service_id) values (#{app}, #{username}, #{serviceId})
mapper.select: select a.service_id AS "serviceId", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.service_desc AS "serviceDesc", a.created_at AS "createdAt", a.updated_at AS "updatedAt", b.username AS "username" from h_dbc_service a, h_dbc_acc_service b where a.service_id = b.service_id and a.service_name = #{serviceName}
mapper.delete: delete from h_dbc_service where service_id in (select service_id from h_dbc_acc_service where app = #{app} and username = #{username} and service_id = #{serviceId})
delete from h_dbc_config where service_id in (select service_id from h_dbc_acc_service where app = #{app} and username = #{username} and service_id = #{serviceId})
